text:
Dim cmd As New SqlCommand("Select Sum(Totalhour) From timee where Name = '" & ComboBox1.SelectedItem.ToString() & "'  And Date Between '" & DateTimePicker1.Value.ToString & "' , '" & DateTimePicker2.Value.ToString & "'", conn)
    conn.Open()

    rd = cmd.ExecuteReader
    While (rd.Read)

        TextBox3.Text = rd.GetValue(0).ToString

    End While
    conn.Close()
